name: abstract_gears_background.jpg
description: A full background image of intricate, interlocking metallic gears with a dark, moody, slightly steampunk aesthetic, lit from the side.

name: bright_sky.jpg
description: A full background image of a clear, bright blue sky with a few fluffy white clouds and a shining sun creating lens flare.

name: city-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a bustling city skyline at dusk, with warm lights starting to turn on in the skyscrapers.

name: rainy-city.jpg
description: A full background image of a city street at night, wet with rain, with vibrant reflections of neon signs on the dark pavement.

name: city_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a modern city skyline on a clear day, shot from a high angle, showing tops of skyscrapers.

name: tech_city_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a futuristic cityscape at night, with glowing blue and purple neon lines and holographic displays on towering buildings.

name: sunrise-field.jpg
description: A full background image of a vast, open field of grass with a brilliant sunrise on the horizon, casting a warm golden light across the landscape.

name: tech_cityscape.jpg
description: A full background image of a sprawling, high-tech cityscape viewed from above, with flying vehicles and massive, interconnected towers under a twilight sky.

name: blueprint_bg.jpg
description: A full background image of a detailed technical blueprint, with glowing white lines, schematics, and measurements on a deep blue background.

name: data_center_background.jpg
description: A full background image looking down a long aisle in a large, modern data center with rows of server racks and glowing blue LED lights fading into the distance.

name: dark_clouds.jpg
description: A full background image of a dramatic, stormy sky filled with dark, turbulent, ominous clouds, with light breaking through in a few spots.

name: winding-path.jpg
description: A full background image of a cobblestone path winding through a lush, green, sun-dappled forest.

name: sky-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a serene sky at sunset, with soft gradients of orange, pink, and purple clouds.

name: empty_city_street_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a completely empty wide city street at dawn, shot from a low angle, with tall buildings on either side.

name: data-center-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a vast, modern data center hall with endless rows of server racks and cool blue ambient lighting.

name: server-room.jpg
description: A full background image providing a close-up, slightly angled view of server racks in a server room, with many blinking green and amber lights.

name: mountains-far.png
description: A majestic, colourful mountain range with sharp, snow-capped peaks, appearing as a distant silhouette, on a white background.

name: gears-midground.png
description: Several large, interlocking colourful metallic gears of bronze and silver, appearing as a complex and functioning mechanism, on a white background.

name: stock-chart-midground.png
description: A vibrant, colourful 3D stock market line graph showing a sharp upward trend with a glowing green line, on a white background.

name: single-tree.png
description: A single, large, colourful oak tree with a full canopy of lush green leaves and a thick, sturdy trunk, standing alone, on a white background.

name: falling-chart.png
description: A colourful, 3D stock market line graph showing a dramatic downward crash with a glowing red line breaking through the floor, on a white background.

name: city-skyline-mid.png
description: The detailed silhouette of a colourful modern city skyline, featuring iconic skyscrapers and buildings of varying heights, on a white background.

name: modern_city.png
description: A cluster of sleek, colourful, futuristic skyscrapers with glass and steel facades, viewed from a dramatic low angle, on a white background.

name: amazon_warehouse_midground.png
description: The interior of a vast, colourful Amazon fulfillment center filled with tall yellow shelves stacked with packages and robotic arms, on a white background.

name: cloud_servers_midground.png
description: A stylized, colourful illustration of glowing server racks seamlessly transforming into fluffy, white digital clouds, symbolizing cloud computing, on a white background.

name: server-racks-midground.png
description: A row of detailed, colourful, standalone server racks with blinking blue and green LED lights, viewed from a front-facing three-quarter angle, on a white background.

name: buildings_midground.png
description: A cluster of colourful, modern office buildings with reflective glass facades, presented in a clean, isometric perspective, on a white background.

name: broken_gears.png
description: A pile of colourful, rusted, and shattered gears of various sizes, conveying a sense of mechanical failure, on a white background.

name: gears-background.png
description: A large, intricate arrangement of colourful, clean, interlocking gears of various sizes, forming a flat mechanical pattern, on a white background.

name: forest-midground.png
description: A dense row of colourful, tall pine and birch trees, forming a thick forest edge with detailed leaves and bark, on a white background.

name: data_overlay_foreground.png
description: A colourful, translucent overlay of glowing blue and cyan digital data, numbers, and holographic charts, intended to be placed over video, on a white background.

name: buildings-foreground.png
description: The detailed, close-up facades of the top floors of several colourful, modern skyscrapers, viewed from a sharp upward angle against a white background.

name: glowing-data.png
description: Streams of colourful, glowing blue and purple particles and light trails representing a fast flow of digital information, on a white background.

name: soundwaves_overlay.png
description: A colourful, abstract visualization of soundwaves, represented by glowing, oscillating neon lines and patterns, on a white background.

name: delivery_drone_foreground.png
description: A sleek, colourful, futuristic quadcopter delivery drone with a bright light, carrying a small package and flying towards the viewer, on a white background.

name: digital_grid.png
description: A glowing, colourful, blue and purple perspective grid made of light, stretching into an infinite horizon, on a white background.

name: fortress.png
description: A massive, imposing, colourful medieval stone fortress with tall fortified walls, battlements, and a large central keep, on a white background.

name: cracked_glass_overlay.png
description: A colourful, translucent overlay of shattered glass, with sharp, jagged cracks spreading from a central impact point, on a white background.

name: biohazard_symbol_overlay.png
description: The iconic, bright yellow and black biohazard symbol, rendered with a slight 3D effect and a soft glow, on a white background.

name: amazon_box_foreground.png
description: A colourful, classic Amazon cardboard box with the smile logo, sealed with tape and sitting at a three-quarter angle, on a white background.

name: sad-people.png
description: A group of diverse, colourfully dressed people with photorealistic, sad, and worried facial expressions, viewed from the chest up, on a white background.

name: glowing_particles.png
description: A swirling cloud of thousands of colourful, bright, out-of-focus glowing particles and specks of light, like digital dust or bokeh, on a white background.

name: data_stream.png
description: A swirling vortex of colourful, glowing green binary code (0s and 1s) that appears to be flowing towards the viewer, on a white background.

name: rain_overlay.png
description: A colourful, translucent overlay of realistic, high-density falling raindrops and water streaks, as if on a window pane, on a white background.

name: phoenix_from_ashes.png
description: A majestic, colourful phoenix bird with enormous, fiery orange and red wings, rising powerfully from a pile of dark ashes, on a white background.

name: resilient-plant.png
description: A small, vibrant, colourful, green plant sprout with two fresh leaves, growing through a single crack in dry, gray, barren ground, on a white background.

name: data_stream_foreground.png
description: A dense, colourful, high-speed stream of glowing blue digital data and light trails flowing horizontally across the frame from left to right, on a white background.

name: aws-logo.png
description: The official, colourful Amazon Web Services (AWS) logo, with its orange smile and black text, perfectly clean and sharp, on a white background.

name: tech-overlay-foreground.png
description: A colourful, complex, futuristic heads-up display (HUD) overlay with glowing blue concentric circles, grid lines, and data readouts, on a white background.

name: gears-foreground.png
description: A close-up view of two large, colourful, detailed metallic gears, one bronze and one silver, interlocked and appearing to be in the immediate foreground, on a white background.
